metadata.title: CVE-2021-4091 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A double-free was found in the way 389-ds-base handles virtual attributes context in persistent searches. An attacker could send a series of search requests, forcing the server to behave unexpectedly, and crash.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
